titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Thomas W. Blinn papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Researcher from Belding, Michigan, specializing in Michigan postal history.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence concerning postal research; and notebooks listing Michigan post offices, including the date of founding and name of first postmaster.
